about_the_game:
The world is broken. All that remains are fragments, forming an ever-changing labyrinth of times and places lost. Explore randomly generated zones, uncover lost stories and amass loot & power as you search for what broke the world and a way to fix it in this action RPG.

  • Utilize a variety of weapons, skills and spells in easy to control beat 'em up style combat.
  • Find and obtain both randomly generated and unique gear with varied bonuses and modifiers to suit your playstyle in a system designed to minimize "trash" items and focus on interesting decisionmaking.
  • Seamlessly connect to other players to cooperatively take on the combined contents of both players' dungeons. Or, use shards found in your travels to set up a multiplayer run in a set dungeon with up to 4 total players.
  • Leave markers for others that are more than just messages; the same nearby enemies, treasures and traps you encountered will appear in their procedurally generated area, allowing players to share particularly rewarding - or punishing - encounters.
